arabic_text: ۞ أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ بَدَّلُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ كُفۡرٗا وَأَحَلُّواْ قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ ٱلۡبَوَارِ
translation: (28) Have you not considered those who exchanged the favor of Allāh for disbelief[658] and settled their people [in] the home of ruin?
footnotes: [658]- They met Allāh's blessing with denial instead of gratitude.
